name: Evolve PRO
description: EVOLVE Pro marks the next chapter of the Evolve Token project, relaunched on the Binance Smart Chain (BNB Chain) as a utility-driven token powering a transformative decentralized finance (DeFi) ecosystem. As an innovative DeFi project, Evolve Token reinvents conventional investment strategies by integrating tokenization, lending pools, fractional ownership, and cross-border trading.
